body_html: I'm getting this error. Are there any workarounds? @xlangacadia, what do you mean by "disabled GPU for Theano"? In .theanorc? I restarted the computer (Theano was running previuosly), so that should have taken care of getting Theano off the GPU, I would think. Restarting did not help.
body_text: I'm getting this error. Are there any workarounds? @xlangacadia, what do you mean by "disabled GPU for Theano"? In .theanorc? I restarted the computer (Theano was running previuosly), so that should have taken care of getting Theano off the GPU, I would think. Restarting did not help.
body: I'm getting this error. Are there any workarounds? @xlangacadia, what do you mean by "disabled GPU for Theano"? In .theanorc? I restarted the computer (Theano was running previuosly), so that should have taken care of getting Theano off the GPU, I would think. Restarting did not help.
